page.title: 13FAMILY ROLES
page.content: We conducted a survey to find out the roles of the different members of the family in our area of Ladywood.These are the results of our research: Jobs undertaken predominantly by women: washing,ironing,washing-up,cleaning the house,shopping for food Jobs undertaken predominantly by men: decorating,gardening,car-washing Jobs undertaken by children: babysitting,shopping,washing-up Our research showed that most domestic jobs are carried out by the women,even though a high percentage of them have part-time jobs. Babysitting is mostly done by young girls and boys.Children share a lot of the men's and women's work.
